title: Across the Marshes
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Henry Varnum Poor [1887-1970]; Frank K. M. Rehn, Inc., New York, NY; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1953 until February 14, 1987; Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994.

Notes:
[1]. Bought from the 1953 Annual Exhibition of Contemporary American Sculpture, Watercolors and Drawings, no. 170 (see Mrs. Beal's original collection card and original exhibition label in curatorial file.) 

Updated and under review by CGK.

creator.death_place: New City (Rockland county, New York state, United States)
